name: The Veteran Codex VII - Dawnfold
description:
Dawnfold was made in 7 days for the 2020 Epic Games Megajam. It's a silly game concept that I've wanted an excuse to put together for a while.
The theme lined up so I took a crack at it. It isn't nearly as fleshed out as I'd like, but 7 days isn't much time. Oh and, yes, it is meant to end like that.
